qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital, patient V. Lewis is 64 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Lakeside General Hospital, patient O. Richardson is 56 years old.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Lakeside General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, V. Lewis or O. Richardson?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: V. Lewis was admitted on July 23, and O. Richardson was admitted on February 15. O. Richardson was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Lakeside General Hospital, what were the recorded temperatures of V. Lewis and O. Richardson upon admission, and how do they compare?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: V. Lewis had a temperature of 38.5°C upon admission, while O. Richardson had a temperature of 98.6°F (37°C). V. Lewis had a higher temperature indicating fever, whereas O. Richardson had a normal temperature.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Newport General Hospital and Lakeside General Hospital, what were the blood pressure readings of V. Lewis and O. Richardson upon admission, and how do they compare?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: V. Lewis had a blood pressure reading of 130/85 mmHg, while O. Richardson had a blood pressure reading of 110/70 mmHg. V. Lewis had a higher blood pressure compared to O. Richardson.
